OOC: This is going to sound a heck of alot like fanfic.  Also rAuq is 
the only one I've discussed this with (since I didn't need to unban 
anything just make sure it wasn't banned to start with), but he may 
notice I changed a few details.  He'll start interacting when he gets 
to Earth.

BIC:  A Pred lutient that looks like TT stands infront of a large 
tanker (not to be confused with tankor).  A green gas is pumped into 
the holding area.  A general walks up to him.

G:  You sure you want to fly this alone.

L:  So long as I'm one step ahead of my brother whose to stop me.

G:  Don't underestimate your brother.  If he thinks there's a chance 
to stop you he'd fight even if it meant civilian casualties.

L: He has no idea where Earth is anyway.  It's not like he's just 
going to get lucky and crash there.  And what's so hard about getting 
into the orbit of a planet and dumping a biological weapon in there 
atmosphere to wipe out all organic life and make sure the Decipticons 
win the great wars.

G:  You do realize you were a Maximal Protoform.

L:  The Autobot fight to  the death hero's on the Ark aren't related 
to me, and the ones back on Cybertron would hopefully surrender to the 
decipticons.  Me and my brother would be one big happy Pred family in 
our own time.

G:  After seeing what this did to those Tranconians I have no doubt 
this gas can do the job.  If something goes wrong just get into the 
escape pod and land remember.

L:  What could go wrong.

G:  I don't know.  They just teach us high up officers to say stuff 
like that if we want to be popular and to say fight to the death if we 
want to be remembered in history as that great General who sadly died 
young possibly in a Mutiny.

L:  Once there aren't any humans to back up the Autobots we win.  
What's so hard about that.

G:  Well when I visited Megatron in prison and he gave me this 
information it sounded like it had been pretty tough for him.

L:  That was because of that Dinobot idiot.  After the tribes 
scattered he didn't have the weapons or tech to wipe them all out so 
he just went for the Ark.

G:  Well then you better be off.

L:  Goodbye.

He get's in and pilots it to Earth.

OOC: I know I should have saved this a while longer, but I have a plan 
to keep the threat to Earth without carring it out.
